The Legacy of GrÃ¨s

Founded by the renowned fashion designer Madame Alix GrÃ¨s, the House of GrÃ¨s has been creating exceptional fragrances since 1959. The Cabotine collection represents the brand's commitment to sophisticated femininity and artistic expression. Fleur De Cabotine continues this legacy as a lighter, more contemporary interpretation of the classic Cabotine fragrance, appealing to modern women who appreciate subtle elegance.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Fleur De Cabotine last on the skin? Fleur De Cabotine offers a moderate longevity of 4-6 hours on most skin types. To extend its wear time, layer the fragrance by applying the body lotion first, then spraying the EDT on pulse points. This layering technique not only enhances longevity but also creates a more dimensional scent experience. For evening wear, consider a light reapplication to maintain the beautiful floral presence throughout your special occasion. ðŸ”¥ Elevate your fragrance collection with this enchanting Fleur De Cabotine Gift Set and experience the delicate balance of floral sophistication that has made this scent a beloved classic among discerning perfume lovers worldwide.
